ack.p: This work comprises, in part, Maysoon Bakriâ€™s master thesis, which was performed at the Virology Research Laboratory-Medical Research Center, Al-Quds University, Palestine. We would like to thank Dr. Amin Thalji, for his kind cooperation allowing us to sample at his private clinic in Ramallah, Palestine. We would also like to thank MICH, specifically Dr. Hatem Khamash, Head of the Neonatal Department at MICH, for their kind cooperation. We would like to thank Al-Sanafer and Al-Iman Kindergartens for approving the sampling at their facilities and reaching out to the parents. We are thankful for friends, acquaintance, and family members for allowing us to take their samples. Finally, we would like to thank Prof. Donald Seto (School of Systems Biology, George Mason University, USA) for critical review of this manuscript.
